query: Coast to Coast gravel race Au Gres to Ludington

videos.title: Double Trouble - Michigan's Coast to Coast RELAY (2025)
videos.description:
My wife wanted to ride her first century, so we figured why not make a day of it! We teamed up for Michigan's Coast to Coast Gravel Grinder, riding 204 miles from Au Gres to Ludington. Needless to say, we had two dramatically different experiences on our separate centuries. lol!

0:00 - Introduction
0:38 - Race Start
6:05 - Gladwin Checkpoint
13:12 - Marion Checkpoint (Relay Swap)
21:57 - Clay Hill Church
27:28 - Big M Checkpoint
32:24 - Finish (Ludington)

videos.title: Michigan’s Coast to Coast Gravel Grinders 2023
videos.description:
Coast to Coast Gravel Grinder (DNF) 

What a journey! Just don’t have any juice left after the 3rd Checkpoint! The sand between checkpoint 2 and 3 was brutal! I went down on the sand section maybe a dozen times 😂! We were 2-3 hours ahead of schedule before the 3rd section! We lost all the gains on that section. We did make it back to the last checkpoint before cutoff time but the three of us were so tired that we decided to DNF! Sam got in a bit earlier to checkpoint 3 and he went ahead and finished the race. Even though it was a tough route, we had a great time! The view from Au Gres to Ludington was incredible.

Thanks to Clint Phillips Samuel Bland and Todd Panciera for pushing me beyond my limits! Great riding with you guys! And congrats to the  Samuel Bland for making it to Lake Michigan!! 💪💪💪

A big shout out to Bob Norcross for  being the best SAG crew ever!! He went above and beyond to take care of us!! Thanks Bob!!!! 

My bike is beat up and I am beat up😃!  Time to recover and plot for the next adventure!
